name: gforms-js
description: Monorepo with dev tools to help building custom forms backed by Google Forms.

scripts.dev: npm run dev -w packages/types & npm run dev -w packages/parser & npm run dev -w packages/submitter & npm run dev -w packages/react-form-hooks & npm run dev -w packages/react
scripts.test: npm run test:ci -w packages/parser & npm run test:ci -w packages/submitter & npm run test:ci -w packages/react-form-hooks
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w packages/types & npm run lint -w packages/parser & npm run lint -w packages/submitter & npm run lint -w packages/react-form-hooks & npm run lint -w packages/react

author: francisconeves97
